Quickstrike:






Quickstrike sat at a chair in the bridge, and bought up a monitor 
closer to him. "Computer, give me camera 2." The blank screen 
flickered and the visual from the ramp appeared. Quickstrike frowned. 
Dang, wrong one, he said to himself. "Computer, give me camera 3." 
The camera station changed to the right flank of the ship, which 
again was the wrong camera.

Quickstrike groaned and curved his mouth plate into an annoyed frown. 
If he could sneer, he would. "Camera 4!" he shouted at the computer. 
He slammed his cobra arm against the arm rest of the chair. The 
camera shifted to another station, that caught the image of 
Scorponok retreating. He noticed a few other bots running after him. 
They must have been Black Arachnia's troops. He grinned then and 
leaned back. 

He would have to memorize the cameras better.
